name: Dog Go
description:
Do you want a canine companion but can't get one irl? Maybe try a simulated shiba, or a pixelated poodle. Dog-Go offers you a range of dogs to clean, feed, and pet!

Lots of stray dogs can be found in cities and suburbs, luckily instead of being sent to the pound, they can come to you for love and care!

Installation Instructions:
1. Download .zip file
2. Extract .zip file
3. Run .exe and enjoy :^)
